thread.title: CSG International to Exhibit at IBC2015, booth Hall 14, Booth L18, Sep 11 - 15, 2015, in Amsterdam, NL
thread.title_full: CSG International to Exhibit at IBC2015, booth Hall 14, Booth L18, Sep 11 - 15, 2015, in Amsterdam, NL

title: CSG International to Exhibit at IBC2015, booth Hall 14, Booth L18, Sep 11 - 15, 2015, in Amsterdam, NL
text:
http://www.linkedin.com/company/csg-international 
About CSG International 
CSG International offers over 30 years of experience and expertise in supporting voice, video, data and content services for the majority of the top 100 global communications service providers, as well as media and content producers. Its Ascendon digital services platform allows service providers, retailers and content producers to quickly create, launch, and monetize compelling offers of video, content, and data across users, channels and devices. During IBC, CSG will demonstrate and discuss how to create powerful customer experiences that turn digital services into revenue. Contacts
